info.title: datannur API
info.description: RESTful API for the datannur data catalog. Provides read-only access to database tables with filtering, pagination, and sorting capabilities.

get.description: Returns all records from the config table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the config table by its ID
Returns all records from the dataset table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the dataset table by its ID
Returns all records from the doc table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the doc table by its ID
Returns all records from the evolution table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the evolution table by its ID
Returns all records from the folder table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the folder table by its ID
Returns all records from the freq table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the freq table by its ID
Returns all records from the institution table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the institution table by its ID
Returns all records from the modality table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the modality table by its ID
Returns all records from the tag table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the tag table by its ID
Returns all records from the value table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the value table by its ID
Returns all records from the variable table with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting
Returns a single record from the variable table by its ID

id.description: Primary key of an app configuration element
id.x-description-fr: Clé primaire d'un élément de configuration de l'app

value.description: Value of the app configuration element
value.x-description-fr: Valeur de l'élément de configuration de l'app

folder_id.description: Key of the folder containing the dataset
folder_id.x-description-fr: Clé du dossier contenant le dataset

manager_id.x-description-fr: Clé de l'institution gestionnaire du dataset

owner_id.description: Key of the data provider institution
owner_id.x-description-fr: Clé de l'institution fournisseur du dataset

type.x-description-fr: Type de dataset (utile pour le filtre générale)

localisation.description: Geographic area covered by the dataset
localisation.x-description-fr: Zone géographique concernée par le dataset

nb_row.description: Number of rows in the dataset
nb_row.x-description-fr: Nombre de ligne dans le dataset

start_date.description: Start of the period covered by the dataset
start_date.x-description-fr: Début de la période couverte par le dataset

end_date.description: End of the period covered by the dataset
end_date.x-description-fr: Fin de la période couverte par le dataset

last_update_date.description: Last update date of the dataset
last_update_date.x-description-fr: Date de denière mise à jour du dataset

updating_each.x-description-fr: Fréquence de mise à jour du dataset

no_more_update.description: Dataset is no longer updated and has no next update date
no_more_update.x-description-fr: Le dataset n'est plus mis à jour et n'a donc pas de date de prochaine mise à jour

last_update.description: Unix timestamp of the last modification
last_update.x-description-fr: Timestamp unix de la dernière modification

type.description: Type of change (addition, deletion or modification)
type.x-description-fr: Type de changement (ajout, suppression ou modification)

entity.description: Name of the entity affected by the change
entity.x-description-fr: Nom de l'entité concernée par le changement

entity_id.description: Key of the element affected by the change
entity_id.x-description-fr: Clé de l'élement concernée par le changement

name.description: Element name (filled in case of deletion)
name.x-description-fr: Nom de l'élément (rempli en cas de suppression)

parent_entity_id.description: Key of the parent element (filled in case of deletion)
parent_entity_id.x-description-fr: Clé de l'élément parent (rempli en cas de suppression)

parent_id.x-description-fr: Clé du dossier contenant le dossier

manager_id.x-description-fr: Clé de l'institution gestionnaire du dossier

owner_id.description: Key of the data provider institution
owner_id.x-description-fr: Clé de l'institution fournisseur du dossier

git_code.description: Code location on a GIT repo
git_code.x-description-fr: Emplacement du code sur un repo GIT

last_update_date.description: Last update date of the folder
last_update_date.x-description-fr: Date de denière mise à jour du dossier

localisation.description: Geographic area covered by the folder
localisation.x-description-fr: Zone géographique concernée par le dossier

start_date.description: Start of the period covered by the folder
start_date.x-description-fr: Début de la période couverte par le dossier

end_date.description: End of the period covered by the folder
end_date.x-description-fr: Fin de la période couverte par le dossier

updating_each.x-description-fr: Fréquence de mise à jour du dossier

no_more_update.description: Folder is no longer updated and has no next update date
no_more_update.x-description-fr: Le dossier n'est plus mis à jour et n'a donc pas de date de prochaine mise à jour

value.x-description-fr: Valeur dont on compte la fréquence

freq.description: Number of occurrences of this value in the variable
freq.x-description-fr: Nombre d'occurrences de cette valeur dans la variable

start_date.description: Start of the period covered by the institution
start_date.x-description-fr: Début de la période couverte par l'institution

end_date.description: End of the period covered by the institution
end_date.x-description-fr: Fin de la période couverte par l'institution

dataset_id.description: Key of the dataset containing the variable
dataset_id.x-description-fr: Clé du dataset contenant la variable

key.description: Is or is part of a unique key
key.x-description-fr: Est ou fait parti d'une clé unique

nb_distinct.description: Number of distinct values in the variable
nb_distinct.x-description-fr: Nombre de valeurs distinctes contenues dans la variable

nb_duplicate.description: Number of repeated values in the variable
nb_duplicate.x-description-fr: Nombre de valeurs répétées contenues dans la variable

nb_missing.description: Number of missing values in the variable
nb_missing.x-description-fr: Nombre de valeurs manquantes contenues dans la variable

start_date.description: Start of the period covered by the variable
start_date.x-description-fr: Début de la période couverte par la variable

end_date.description: End of the period covered by the variable
end_date.x-description-fr: Fin de la période couverte par la variable

source_var_ids.x-description-fr: Liste des clés des variables sources (lineage)

tags.name: config
tags.description: General information, including descriptions of different entities

tags.name: doc
tags.description: Documentation (pdf, md) attached to an element

tags.name: institution
tags.description: Institutions, they can be owners or managers of folders or datasets

tags.name: value
tags.description: Values and their description within a modality
